# 运营增长实战手记小黑书（鸟哥笔记）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yunying-zengchang-shizhan-shouji-xiaohei-shu-niaoge-biji
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yunying-zengchang-shizhan-shouji-xiaohei-shu-niaoge-biji
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yunying-zengchang-shizhan-shouji-xiaohei-shu-niaoge-biji
yunying-zengchang-shizhan-shouji-xiaohei-shu-niaoge-biji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yunying-zengchang-shizhan-shouji-xiaohei-shu-niaoge-biji
yunying-zengchang-shizhan-shouji-xiaohei-shu-niaoge-biji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
